review_title: Very good organization to work for
pros: It is people centered and focused on the most vulnerable women and girls
cons: There are no downsides that are different from most NGOs.

review_title: Handling all issues of finance in the region
job_title: Finance Officer, Southern Region in Choma, Southern
pros: I loved to volunteer, because YWCA is a non-profit, voluntary organization.
cons: When not funded employees go for years and years not paid.That makes other regional offices fail to operate,fail to employees etc.
